### Conflicts
Reviewers, this pull request conflicts with the following ones:

* [#17261](https://drahtbot.github.io/bitcoin_core_issue_redirect/r/17261.html) (Make ScriptPubKeyMan an actual interface an
Rebased now that base PR #17843 is merged.

utACK https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/17889/commits/fd6d0679e7c3a956afc273fa38f64dab3f0ed223\n\nthough I think better encapsulation of these concepts would be a plus so we can't accidentally mark dirty or set the cache without knowing.
a comment for semantics and uses would be nice
I don't think we should have an early return. The reset shouldn't be very expensive, and I think it's better to be sure that the cache is cleared when `m_is_cache_empty = true`
nit: typo in `usefull`. Not going to let it hold up merge though.
